item.title: 918.Maximum Sum Circular Subarray-环形子数列中的最大元素和
item.description: 问题描述 Given a circular array C of integers represented by A, find the maximum possible sum of a non-empty subarray of C. Here, a circular array means the end of the array connects to the beginning of the array. (Formally, C[i] = A[i] when 0 <= i < A.length, and C[i+A.length] = C[i] when i >= 0.) Also, a subarray may only include each element of the
